kpi.name: M8021C1

kpi_info.title: Number of inter frequency Handover attempts (measurement gap assisted)
kpi_info.use: The number of intra LTE inter-frequency Handover attempts when measurement gaps are configured for the UE. It comprises the intra- and inter-eNB Handover scenario. UPDATED: intra-eNB HO: This counter is updated following the transmission of an RRC Connection Reconfiguration message sent by the eNB to the UE, which indicates a Handover Command to the UE in case that this message is sent in response to the preparation of an inter-frequency Intra eNB Handover and when measurement gaps are configured for the UE.

kpi.kpi_alias: Number of inter frequency Handover attempts (measurement gap assisted)
